name: Lizard
description: Put on a lizard and go for an adventure! Six different ones are scattered across the land, each with a special ability. Carefully hop your way to the top of an active volcano. Surf down a surging river. Swim an underwater lake. Ascend a snowy mountaintop. Can you unravel the mysteries of Lizard?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2, Vista, 7, 8 or 10 Processor: 1.0 GHz (SSE2) Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Any Storage: 5 MB available space
